# Drow Feats
## Overview
***The following feats are exclusively available to [[Drow|drow]] in Aventyr.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Drow|drow]] feats introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Arachnid Athletics]]
- [[Drow Blade Masters]]
- [[Spider Speaker]]
- [[Survival Instinct]]
- [[Vindictive Hatred]]
